
# V1 List Modifier Lists Response

## Structure

`V1ListModifierListsResponse`

## Fields

| Name | Type | Tags | Description | Getter | Setter |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `items` | [`?(V1ModifierList[])`](/doc/models/v1-modifier-list.md) | Optional | - | getItems(): ?array | setItems(?array items): void |

```json
{
  "items": [
```
